{"@context": "http://schema.org", "@type": "JobPosting", "datePosted": "2021-10-05T17:21:56.000Z", "description": "

As an Senior Software Engineer - OnLink for John Deere's Intelligent Solutions Group (ISG) you will be the technical Leader for the development of the OnLink product that enables golf course professionals to plan, monitor, and complete the work to maintain the golf course and their business operations. Our Staff Engineers are technical leaders \u2013 designing and developing production software, championing software development practices and mentoring/coaching the team members on industry trends.   An ideal candidate will be someone with a passion for being in the code and a demonstrated history of technical leadership in delivering global software products.


Here is a link to learn more about the OnLink application - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=c2RDLV-5y1s
